rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0001
rows.name:
Boss! Tora have to ask for friend,
as fellow man's man!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0002
rows.name:
Tora want to gain understanding
of life as adventurer!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0003
rows.name: As an adventurer?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0004
rows.name:
Boss is role-model of Tora!
That why Tora want to learn everything
he can about being Rex-Rex!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0005
rows.name:
This is all very sudden, Tora.
What's going on?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0006
rows.name:
Come now, Rex.
Don't feel too important,
he just wants to talk.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0007
rows.name:
In any case, it not so common for
Masterpon to ask something so directly.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0008
rows.name:
Exactly! Tora being earnest like
never before! Hm!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0009
rows.name:
Tora submit as evidence: this direct,
unflinching eye contact!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0010
rows.name: Wow, your pupils are really dilated...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0011
rows.name:
That's what you get, staying up all
night...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0012
rows.name:
All right, tonight Masterpon
go to bed early.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0013
rows.name:
Meh-meh-meh-meh! Enough!
Tora's eyes are worry of Tora!
It not matter!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0014
rows.name:
This important!
Tora want to be like Rex-Rex!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0015
rows.name: Boss! Please, teach Tora!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0016
rows.name: How do I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0017
rows.name: I'll teach you all that life's taught me!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0018
rows.name: Maybe it's better if Nia teaches you?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0101
rows.name:
Thank you!
Tora cannot wait!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0102
rows.name:
All right, Tora, listen up.
To become a responsible adult, here's
what you need to do.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0103
rows.name:
Firstly, you've got to take good care
of your tools!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0104
rows.name:
Ah, Tora very good at that! Runs
Hana's diagnostics every day!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0105
rows.name:
Indeed, Masterpon keep Hana in
impeccable state of maintenance.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0106
rows.name:
Secondly, you've got to take good care
of your friends!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0107
rows.name:
If you don't have friends to rely on,
you'll be in trouble when a big job
comes around!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0108
rows.name: Hum hum hum, Tora see...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0109
rows.name:
Tora always work alone until now,
so that point still a little new to Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0110
rows.name: And most importantly, number three!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0111
rows.name: Yes, yes?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0112
rows.name:
Correctly triangulating wreckage
coordinates!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0113
rows.name:
Ah, of course!
Tora can see that very important!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0114
rows.name: ...One moment. Wreckage coordinates?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0115
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0116
rows.name:
If you mess up the coordinates, all the
prep you've done goes down the drain.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0117
rows.name:
You might lose out on any loot
you could've got otherwise...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0119
rows.name:
Um, Rex. Isn't that salvaging you're
talking about...?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0120
rows.name:
Uh?
Yeah, why?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0121
rows.name:
One moment please.
Why boss talking about salvaging?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0122
rows.name:
You wanted to know about adventure,
yeah? And what greater adventure
is there than salvaging?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0123
rows.name:
Tora want to know Driver wisdom!
Have no use for salvager wisdom! Meh!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0124
rows.name: Whuh?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0125
rows.name:
Masterpon, it seem that ask
Rex about art of being Driver
not bear fruit.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0126
rows.name: After all, Rex is a rookie too...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0127
rows.name: ...Tora is disappoint.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0128
rows.name:
I really thought you were thinking
of being a salvager, Tora...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0129
rows.name:
...Meh. It fine.
Tora ask Nia.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0130
rows.name: H-hang on, Tora!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0131
rows.name:
Let me...
Let me try again!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0201
rows.name:
Okay, so you want to know
about being a Driver, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0202
rows.name: Right!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0203
rows.name:
Does it bother Masterpon when
someone say he no good at weapon
pass?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0204
rows.name: Of course it bother Tora!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0205
rows.name:
I mean, weapon pass is crucial
element of Driver-Blade coordination...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0206
rows.name:
If someone say me not so great at that,
Tora's self-esteem plunge is
par for course!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0207
rows.name: I know where you're coming from, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0208
rows.name:
Uh, maybe that's all the more reason
to ask Nia? She's the experienced one
around here...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0209
rows.name:
Mehhh... Tora get it.
Will ask and come back...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0210
rows.name:
Nia just say, with time, body of Driver
learn to do it by muscle memory...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0211
rows.name: Answer seem somewhat...dismissive...?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0212
rows.name: Ah, that's a shame...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0213
rows.name: Hey, but, maybe I can still help?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0214
rows.name: I think Homura and I manageokay, so...

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0215
rows.name: Actually, Nia refer to boss as well.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0216
rows.name:
Hana believe "the kid's green as
freshly mowed grass himself"...
were her exact words.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0218
rows.name: Seriously?!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0219
rows.name: That's what she thinks of me...?

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0220
rows.name: Chin up, boss.

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0221
rows.name:
Indeed!
Have much time to live and learn!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0222
rows.name: Yeah! We'll get there!

rows.label: kizunatalk021_msg0223
rows.name:
He says he'll help, but then he's the
one who needs pepping up...
